appetizers.name: Fruit Bowl
appetizers.description: In season fruit chopped and mixed together.

appetizers.name: Cheeze sticks
appetizers.description: Breaded mozzarella cheese air fried to perfection and served with marinara sauce.

cold sandwiches.name: Ultimate Avocado Toast
cold sandwiches.description: Freshly smashed avacado spread on muiltigrain toast with sliced tomatoes on top.

cold sandwiches.name: Lox Bagel Sandwich
cold sandwiches.description: Everything begal with cream cheese stacked with smoked salmon, red onions and capers.

hot sandwiches.name: Philly Cheesesteak with Peppers and Onions
hot sandwiches.description: Hoagie topped with sirloin, bell peppers, onions and melted provolone cheese.

hot sandwiches.name: Sirloin Steak Sandwich
hot sandwiches.description: Perfectly cooked sirloin served on an onion roll with tomato, red onions and arugula.

desserts.name: Eclair
desserts.description: Pastry dough filled with cream and topped with chocolate icing

desserts.name: White Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookie
desserts.description: Soft pumpkin cookie with white chocolate chips.

drinks.name: Hot or Iced Mocha Coffee
drinks.description: Hot or cold coffe with either chocolate or white chocolate sauce.

drinks.name: Fruit Smoothie
drinks.description: Refreshing fruit smoothie made your way.
